description: An anticoagulant medication used to prevent blood clots and embolism in conditions such as atrial fibrillation.
mechanism: Inhibits vitamin K epoxide reductase, preventing the activation of vitamin K-dependent clotting factors.

description: An antiplatelet medication used to reduce the risk of heart disease and stroke in those at high risk.
mechanism: Inhibits the P2Y12 component of ADP receptors on the platelet surface, which prevents activation of the GPIIb/IIIa receptor complex.

description: A statin medication used to lower blood cholesterol and reduce the risk of cardiovascular disease.
mechanism: Inhibits HMG-CoA reductase, a liver enzyme involved in cholesterol production.
